series.title: Adventures in Finance: A Real Vision Podcast
series.author: Real Vision

episodes.seriesTitle: Adventures in Finance: A Real Vision Podcast
episodes.title: 001 - Adventures with India Demonetization
episodes.summary: Dive into the intended and unintended consequences of India’s stealth demonetization. Hear the financial nerds at Real Vision discuss precarious pensions, curious currencies, and cheap heads of state. Listen in on Raoul Pal, co-founder of Real Vision and author of the Global Macro Investor, confessing to an investing sin, and an expert guest explains the carry trade.
